comments.author: Papillion
comments.body: do you have photo proof of the equipment?additionally do you accept escrow on account that its difficult to trust people that just talk about equipment without proof.

comments.author: jbgsmininggmbh
comments.body: Quote from: Papillion on May 11, 2023, 12:27:27 AMdo you have photo proof of the equipment?additionally do you accept escrow on account that its difficult to trust people that just talk about equipment without proof.sure i could provide you proof of our locations and equipment. Just send me an email.
